chara.textHome: Hi, I'm Ikumi Makino.

I'm a Magical Girl, but I'm actually
a bit older than most of the others.
I normally work at a maid cafe, but...

Wait, never mind! I-I mean
I'm the suuuper adorable head maid!
I pour oodles of love into everybody's hearts!

Every time someone calls me
old-fashioned, I know they're
reeeally saying that they love me!
I won't ever ever change!
After all, I'm not just doing this for me.
I'm doing this for my bestest best friend, too!

I'm sooo super full of love
that it's overflowing!

I have to survive,
or I'll end up killing her, too...

It's not easy to balance my personal life
and being a Magical Girl.

But I'm a professional,
so I won't ever stop smiling.
I'm Ikumi, the Head Maid!

There's no escaping the fate of
Magical Girls by yourself.

That's why I chose to follow
someone else's plans.
I have goals I need to achieve.
Welcome hooome, Master!

I'm super happy you've
come to see me again today!

Please, sit back and relax
as long as you like!

If I leave from here to the station, ugh...
I might not make it to my dance class...
Oops! I mean...

Aww, I'm super-duper sad that
I'm gonna be late, I might cry...!
Was that in character?
Make it yummy, make it yummy!

All done!
Heeere you go, it's my specially made,
super-delicious lunch plate!
Enjoy it while it's hot!
It's your most favoritest maid, Ikumi!
My full name is Ikumi Makino!

After you see me today,
you won't be able to think about
anyone else, so get ready!

Attention please, masters and young misses
coming home from school or work!

My super adorable heart-warming
live show is about to begin!

Aww...
My predecessor used to help me
close up shop, but now I do it all alone...
It's so lonely... Waaaaaah...
I guess I'd better balance the cash register.
It's not an act!
This is the real me, got it?
You must've been imagining things!

Waaaaaah!
There's a Witch nearby.
I'm so scared!
Someone, please help me!
Oh...there's nobody around...
I'd better go defeat it...

If Endless Mirrors made a bunch of
copies of me, then it'd be super cute
with all this pink hair around!
Ooo, maybe that'd end up being great!

I'm a maid right now, but one day
I'm gonna be a super-charming,
ultra-adorable, totally successful idol!
Mhuh? I was staring off into space?
Are you sure?

My trademark is being
cheerful and full of energy!
Let's keep smiling together!

I really looove the color pink,
and extra frilly clothes!

They're just so cute and soft,
they make me feel happy.

Oh wooow, this outfit is
super-duper adorable!

I bet our fans would LOVE it
if I shared the new menu wearing
this outfit on social media!

Hey, which maid called me
old-fashioned just now?!
I'm scary when I'm mad, you know!
Mruuugh!
I used to like much sportier stuff in the past.

But before I knew it, I started
liking super cute things waaay more!
Oh, I hope I signed up properly...

My best friend's volleyball game
is gonna be streaming later today.
I don't wanna miss it.

I'm devoted to Mifuyu and
the liberation movement...
That's why I'm working with the Magius.

I'm doing it for the dream
I share with my friend.

Reeeady?
Look...over...there!
Oh gosh, you won!

You get an extra-special photo op with me.
Please treasure it always!
Welcooome! I'll be your maid today!
Waaaaaah! That was super scary!

I've gotta get back to the cafe,
my show's about to start!

I won't die...
Not until your dream comes true...

My warmth and extra-special love
will never fade away!
I can't help it if I keep getting cuter!

Thanks sooo much for your support!
I'm gonna blow you a kiss, so catch it!
You wanna know more about me?
Okay, but keep it a secret!

People say I've got an old-fashioned,
cutesy act, but this is the real me!

Besides, no one else acts like this now,
so I'm like a niche character!
